def.dt: :a device that is used for taking photographs or for making movies, television programs, etc.
:away from a television or movie camera :not on television or in a movie He is a different person (when he's) off camera.

:within the range of a television or movie camera :on television or in a movie He looks very relaxed (when he's) on camera. His attempt to break into the store was caught on camera. [=a camera recorded his attempt to break into the store]
:a camera that takes pictures without using film :a camera that records images as digital data
:a camera that is used to create videos by recording moving images and sounds onto a videotape, computer disk, etc.
